Performance:
September 1980: The New Usuyuki Story

Production: September 1980

Play: The New Usuyuki Story (新薄雪物語)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Cherry-Viewing (地主権現花見 / Jishu Gongen hanami)

The Kiyomizu Temple (清水寺 / Kiyomizudera)

The Messenger Shibukawa (渋川使者 / Shibukawa shisha)

The Consultation (評議 / Hyōgi)

Sonobe's House (園部屋敷 / Sonobe yashiki)

The Blacksmith Shop (鍛冶屋 / Kajiya)

Characters:

Usuyuki (Usuyuki Hime / 薄雪姫)

Magaki (Koshimoto Magaki / 腰元籬)

Saemon (Sonobeno Saemon / 園部左衛門)

Kuniyuki (Rai Kuniyuki / 来国行)

Tsumahei (Yakko Tsumahei / 奴妻平)

Chief priest of the Kiyomizu Temple (Kiyomizudera jūshoku / 清水寺住職)

Priest of the Kiyomizu Temple (Kiyomizudera jisō / 清水寺寺僧)

Kunitoshi (Rai Kunitoshi / 来国俊)

Dankuro (Dankurō / 団九郎)

Daizen Akizuki (Akizuki Daizen / 秋月大膳)

Toma (Shibukawa Tōma / 渋川藤馬)

Iganokami's wife (Saizaki no okugata / 幸崎の奥方)

Iganokami (Saizaki Iganokami / 幸崎伊賀守)

Mimbu Katsuragi (Katsuragi Minbu / 葛城民部)

Hyoe (Sonobeno Hyōe / 園部兵衛)

Priest (Gōbō no jisō / 轟坊の寺僧)

Oume (Oume no Kata / お梅の方)

Heizo (Hanekawa Hyōzō / 刎川兵蔵)

Oren (Musume Oren / 娘おれん)

Masamune (Gorōbyōe Masamune / 五郎兵衛正宗)

Unai (Shibukawa Unai / 渋川右内)

Servant (Mizuyakko / 水奴)
